data.title: Israeli MK Causes Uproar in Knesset After Signing Petition Accusing Israel of Genocide in Gaza
data.meta_description: After Ofer Cassif, MK in the Arab-Jewish Hadash-Ta'al Party, Signed the South Africa Petition, Fellow Knesset Members Called for His Removal. Cassif Explained His Reasoning, Saying 'My Constitutional Duty Is to Israeli Society' Not to the Government Who Calls for 'Ethnic Cleansing and Even Actual Genocide'
